ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
ingredients.searchTerm: diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
ingredients.normalizedName: Diced Tomato With Green Chile Pepper

ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, cut into cubes
1 (8 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
¼ cup chopped jalapeno pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Drain spinach thoroughly to prevent excess moisture in the dip
Heat gently and stir frequently to keep cheeses smooth and prevent separation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user layer cheeses properly and manage heat to maintain a creamy consistency without breaking.
